mean_en: to find an acceptable way of dealing with two or more ideas, needs, etc. that seem to be opposed to each other; to make people become friends again after an argument or a disagreement
sentence: They are desperate to reconcile and fix their broken hearts.
sentence_trans: 他们迫切地想要和解，修复两人受伤的心。
word_etyma: re一再，重新 + con共同 + cile召集 → 双方再次召集到一起 → reconcile和解
